txt.en: 'There are more threats in the North Trollshaws than just spiders, [placeholder]. Stone-trolls have come down out of the Ettenmoors to settle here in the North Trollshaws. I have seen them encamped in large number at the ruins of Ost Belegram to the south-west of here.\n\n'If you and your companions could deal with them ere they become a threat to the rest of the Trollshaws, I would be grateful.'
Stone-trolls have come down out of the Ettenmoors to settle in the North Trollshaws.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. Trolls are a creature we shall not brook in our lands, though they seem to be more numerous than ever before.'
Stone-trolls can be found at the ruins of Ost Belegram, south-west of Thoroniel's encampment.\n\nThoroniel has asked you and your companions to deal with the Stone-trolls of the North Trollshaws.
Defeat Stone-trolls in the North Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Stone-trolls in the North Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thoroniel is posted north-east of Ost Belegram, in the North Trollshaws.\n\nYou should return to Thoroniel and let her know that you have done as she has asked.
